actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (1d12+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Stalwart
special_abilities.desc: If the orc starts its turn afflicted by an ongoing effect that allows for a repeated save to end the effect, such as the hold spell or the poison from an ettercap's Bite, the orc can make the save at the start of the turn instead of the end and has advantage on the save.
